name: talkTECH Communications
tag_list: rebekah-iliff, kristen-tischhauser, los-angeles-tech-pr, southern-california-tech-pr, business-and-technology-pr-firm, best-los-angeles-pr-agency, best-tech-public-relations, los-angeles-tech-public-relations, los-angeles-technology-communications-firm, l
overview:
talkTECH Communications is a business and technology communications firm focused on public relations and interactive marketing for early stage tech start-ups and small to medium size businesses (SMBs) looking to generate buzz about new technology products or service offerings.

We collaborate with our clients to build brand awareness and create buzz through public and media relations, analyst relations, user feedback and customer reviews, case study development and distribution, article writing and byline placements, and social media engagement.

From strategy to storytelling to social media, talkTECH understands the many facets of communication and executes a plan that will get people talking about your business, sharing your bright ideas, and ultimately building your reputation as a thought leader.
